content: archived pdf http //web archive org/web/20100926134017/http //caron com/projects/jb/mesh_hat pdf skill level intermediate materials caron jewel box™ * discontinued * 64% acrylic 20% rayon 16% polyester 2 5oz/70 9g 100yds/92m 2 skeins in #0002 moonstone *when using jewel box be sure to tie a knot at the beginning of each skein and at both yarn ends when joining a small amount of shedding can be expected when using this yarn under normal conditions * 7mm us size k/10 5 crochet hook or size to obtain gauge stitches used front post single_crochet fpsc half-double_crochet half_double_crochet hat is worked in the round beginning at the crown
